conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, visible floor plane, perceivable room volumes, and an angled/isometric viewpoint with the ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion (height + thickness) with readable corners and floor/wall separation; clean cutaway and stable isometric view with minimal distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall 3BHK-like zoning is present (central living/dining, kitchen cluster, three bedrooms, multiple toilets), but some plan-specific fidelity is uncertain/softened: balcony/cutout locations and several partition lengths/proportions do not clearly match the 2D plan, and some adjacencies appear simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Beds in bedrooms, sofa seating in living, and kitchen counters/fixtures are present; bathroom blocks/fixtures are indicated. Minor mismatches in exact room assignment/orientation relative to the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is readable with clear wall/floor separation and good lighting; no major mesh breaks. Openings and balcony edges are not always clearly delineated, reducing verification confidence.

detected_errors.description: Plan fidelity deviations/simplifications: balcony placement/extent and several wall run proportions/partition alignments are not clearly consistent with the 2D floor plan.
Some doors/windows/openings are not verifiably on the exact walls/sides indicated in the 2D plan or are simplified in size/orientation.
Furniture arrangement appears plausible but may not correspond precisely to the room boundaries and circulation implied by the 2D plan (orientation/placement simplified).

summary: A clear, correct 3D cutaway conversion with strong volumetric rendering, but with moderate layout/proportion and opening-placement uncertainties versus the 2D plan.
